SYSTEM CONTEXT VIEW
The System Context View is the second view created in FreePraXtice. The purpose of the System Context View is to set the solution in context for the following Logical System Design task It shows the relationship between the existing and “proposed” systems. The System Context View contains both existent components and component that have not yet been defined and as such it is a bridge between the current state and a target state. It is a more sophisticated view in that it contains elements from both the Business and the Application layers.
